title: Elementary Japanese I
description: Essential principles of Japanese grammar and phonetics, acquisition of vocabulary through conversational exercises, video, and tape material. Introduction to the kana writing system.  Humanities credit is awarded for JAPN 1001 upon successful completion of JAPN 1002 or JAPN 2001.
